name: Letters should be displayed with the correct color
scenarioId: classpath:features/rules/game_rules:Letters should be displayed with the correct color
methodName: Letters should be displayed with the correct color

testSteps.description: 1: Letters should be displayed with the correct color ({target word=CRYPT, player input=CRYPT, cell 1=GREEN, cell 2=GREEN, cell 3=GREEN, cell 4=GREEN, cell 5=GREEN})

children.description:
Then the squares should be colored as follows:
| GREEN | GREEN | GREEN | GREEN | GREEN |

testSteps.description: 2: Letters should be displayed with the correct color ({target word=CRYPT, player input=BOARD, cell 1=GRAY, cell 2=GRAY, cell 3=GRAY, cell 4=YELLOW, cell 5=GRAY})

children.description:
Then the squares should be colored as follows:
| GRAY | GRAY | GRAY | YELLOW | GRAY |

testSteps.description: 3: Letters should be displayed with the correct color ({target word=CRYPT, player input=CROWN, cell 1=GREEN, cell 2=GREEN, cell 3=GRAY, cell 4=GRAY, cell 5=GRAY})

children.description:
Then the squares should be colored as follows:
| GREEN | GREEN | GRAY | GRAY | GRAY |

userStory.narrative:
The rules of Wordle are simple. Your objective is to guess a secret five-letter word in as few guesses as possible.
  To submit a guess, type any five-letter word and press enter.
  All of your guesses must be real words, according to a dictionary of five-letter words that Wordle allows as guesses.

  Players have to guess a five-letter word.
  - Correctly placed letters are shown as GREEN
  - Incorrectly placed letters are shown as YELLOW
  - Letters not appearing in the word are represented as GRAY

title: Letters should be displayed with the correct color

rule.name: Correctly placed letters appear in green
